entry.value: Duplicate same id records found in file
Data validation file: ${filename} Error while extracting columns from file. columns did not match.
logsumary: file:${filename} with total records and blank lines are added to log summary table.
Total records, after removing duplicates in ${filename}: ${record.count}
Data validation, student attendance file: ${filename} blank line validation started.
Data type validation, file: ${filename} has invalid data type: invalid record=${count.invalid.lines} , Total records=${count.total.lines}
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename}, same id records not found
update log_summary as b set processed_records= a.processed_records from ( select ff_uuid,count(*)as processed_records from log_summary group by ff_uuid) as a where a.ff_uuid=b.ff_uuid
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename}.Error while checking mirror data
UPDATE files_ingestion SET status ='KO', storage_date = ${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS")} WHERE ff_uuid = '${files_uuid}'
log summary file: ${filename} duplicate count updated to log summary db.
null validation file: ${filename} Error while getting null values
null validation file: ${filename} null values are not found.
Data validation file: ${filename} columns validation started.
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename}, same id records found
Duplicate mirror records found in file
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename} started
null validation file: ${filename} with ${count.valid.lines} null values are found.
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename} started
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename} error while same id mirror data
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename}, Mirror data found
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename}.Error while selecting unique data
File: ${filename} has no records in, pass the file with records
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename} completed and deleted the mirror data
update log_summary SET duplicate_records = (select sum(duplicate_records)+${hd}from log_summary where ff_uuid= '${files_uuid}') where ff_uuid= '${files_uuid}'

select StudentAttendanceId as "attendance_id",StudentId as "student_id",SchoolId as "school_id",`${now():format('yyyy'):toNumber():minus(1)}` as "year","Month", case when "1" = 'NULL' then '0' else "1" end as "day_1", case when "2" = 'NULL' then '0' else "2" end as "day_2", case when "3" = 'NULL' then '0' else "3" end as "day_3", case when "4" = 'NULL' then '0' else "4" end as "day_4", case when "5" = 'NULL' then '0' else "5" end as "day_5", case when "6" = 'NULL' then '0' else "6" end as "day_6", case when "7" = 'NULL' then '0' else "7" end as "day_7", case when "8" = 'NULL' then '0' else "8" end as "day_8", case when "9" = 'NULL' then '0' else "9" end as "day_9", case when "10" = 'NULL' then '0' else "10" end as "day_10", case when "11" = 'NULL' then '0' else "11" end as "day_11", case when "12" = 'NULL' then '0' else "12" end as "day_12", case when "13" = 'NULL' then '0' else "13" end as "day_13", case when "14" = 'NULL' then '0' else "14" end as "day_14", case when "15" = 'NULL' then '0' else "15" end as "day_15", case when "16" = 'NULL' then '0' else "16" end as "day_16", case when "17" = 'NULL' then '0' else "17" end as "day_17", case when "18" = 'NULL' then '0' else "18" end as "day_18", case when "19" = 'NULL' then '0' else "19" end as "day_19", case when "20" = 'NULL' then '0' else "20" end as "day_20", case when "21" = 'NULL' then '0' else "21" end as "day_21", case when "22" = 'NULL' then '0' else "22" end as "day_22", case when "23" = 'NULL' then '0' else "23" end as "day_23", case when "24" = 'NULL' then '0' else "24" end as "day_24", case when "25" = 'NULL' then '0' else "25" end as "day_25", case when "26" = 'NULL' then '0' else "26" end as "day_26", case when "27" = 'NULL' then '0' else "27" end as "day_27", case when "28" = 'NULL' then '0' else "28" end as "day_28", case when "29" = 'NULL' then '0' else "29" end as "day_29", case when "30" = 'NULL' then '0' else "30" end as "day_30", case when "31" = 'NULL' then '0' else "31" end as "day_31" from flowfile
